name: Synclavier Optical Disk Image File
summary: Learn about .SOPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A SOPT file is an optical disk image format used by Synclavier, a digital music workstation. It contains data from Synclavier optical disks, which include digital audio and related information for music production. SOPT files are saved in a proprietary format specific to the Synclavier system, ensuring compatibility with its hardware and software for reading and managing audio data.
